tool_description: Send and receive messages from WhatsApp via Maytapi. It is a stable and reliable solution. See more:  https://maytapi.com/
name: Maytapi WhatsApp
title: Maytapi WhatsApp

api_list.name: queue
api_list.description: Returns the queue info of the phone.

api_list.name: purgeQueue
getStatus
api_list.description: Returns the status of the current session.

api_list.name: getQRCode
getProduct
api_list.description: Gets the product id and webhook url of the account.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://maytapi-whatsapp.p.rapidapi.com/product"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maytapi-whatsapp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getListPhones
api_list.description: Gets the list of phones with their id's and numbers that are registered to the given product id.

api_list.name: getScreen
api_list.description: Returns the screenshot of the screen in the current session

api_list.name: getGroups
api_list.description: Sets the option for getting the acknowledge messages from the webhook to true or false.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://maytapi-whatsapp.p.rapidapi.com/12/getGroups"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maytapi-whatsapp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://maytapi-whatsapp.p.rapidapi.com/{phone_id}/getGroups"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "maytapi-whatsapp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: redeploy
api_list.description: Redeploys docker instance of your phone. If your phone having any unexpected problems you can use this endpoint to reboot the instance.
